info.name: Green & Red Like Button For YouTube
info.description:
It Changes The Look Of The Like And Dislike Buttons On YouTube. It Makes The Like Button Green and The Dislike Button Red.

I Was Also Using https://userstyles.org/styles/137820/old-dislike-like-bar-youtube By Skeleton 11223 For The YouTube Like Bar.

data.title: BE Free To Leave Some Feed Back Or Tell Me About Bugs
